20 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
21 #include <memory>
22 #include <ros/ros.h>
23 #include <ros/service_client.h>
24 
25 #include "joints_interface/joints_interface_core.hpp"
26 
27 static std::unique_ptr<ros::NodeHandle> nh;
28 
29 TEST(TESTSuite, deactivateLearningMode)
30 {
31  auto client = nh->serviceClient<niryo_robot_msgs::SetBool>("/niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate");
32 
33  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(5)));
34  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
35 
36  niryo_robot_msgs::SetBool srv;
37  srv.request.value = false;
38  client.call(srv);
39 
40  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
41 }
42 
43 TEST(TESTSuite, activateLearningMode)
44 {
45  auto client = nh->serviceClient<niryo_robot_msgs::SetBool>("/niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate");
46 
47  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(10)));
48  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
49 
50  niryo_robot_msgs::SetBool srv;
51  srv.request.value = true;
52  client.call(srv);
53 
54  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
55 }
56 
57 TEST(TESTSuite, resetControllerServer)
58 {
59  auto client = nh->serviceClient<niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger>("/niryo_robot/joints_interface/steppers_reset_controller");
60 
61  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
62  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
63 
64  niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger srv;
65  client.call(srv);
66 
67  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
68 }
69 
70 TEST(TESTSuite, requestNewCalibration)
71 {
72  auto client = nh->serviceClient<niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger>("/niryo_robot/joints_interface/request_new_calibration");
73 
74  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
75  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
76 
77  niryo_robot_msgs::Trigger srv;
78  client.call(srv);
79 
80  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
81 }
82 
83 TEST(TESTSuite, calibrateMotor)
84 {
85  auto client = nh->serviceClient<niryo_robot_msgs::SetInt>("/niryo_robot/joints_interface/calibrate_motors");
86 
87  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
88  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
89 
90  niryo_robot_msgs::SetInt srv;
91  srv.request.value = 1; // AUTO_CALIBRATION;
92  client.call(srv);
93 
94  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
95 }
96 
97 int main(int argc, char **argv)
98 {
99  ros::init(argc, argv, "joints_interface_service_client");
100 
101  nh = std::make_unique<ros::NodeHandle>();
102 
103  testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
104 
105  ros::Duration(10.0).sleep();
106  return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
107 }
